trends: There have been no other sightings in New York City
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst of all, I apologize for making this report so late. I just found out of the existence of this website. I was made aware to the whole "October 13th" theory through multiple web source, and obviously, I was skeptical. To keep things short, October 13th came and I realized it would all blow over. However, as I got on 4chan's paranormal board, I was greeted to thread upon thread of people talking about this streams. So I found a link and hopped in. At first, they seemed like planes, but soon I realized that planes simply wouldn't act like this. Planes don't break apart from each other and fly in straight upwards. Planes don't stop in mid-flight and drop down 50 feet. So, I started snapping screenshots. The ones attached are the best available ones I have. The long picture shows a VERY bright light we saw at one point move to the left in the frame, then down slightly, then right back out in a matter of 10 minutes. Simply unbelievable. Soon, all the lights disappeared into the night, and all we were left with was a still-lively New York City. I was watching this cam along at least 40-50 other people.
Summary: Watched a cam stream of the NYC skyline, noticed extremely unusual and unnatural light behavior.
